n: Slow Cooker Macaroni and Cheese II
des: "Easy, easy, easy!  This has been a long time family favorite and can easily be doubled.  The kids love it!  Great for busy days; prepare in the late morning and enjoy at dinnertime."
ins:
Combine in slow cooker: evaporated milk, paprika, salt, egg, butter and cheese; stir. Cook on high for 1 hour.
Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Add macaroni and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente; drain.
Stir cooked macaroni into cheese sauce, reduce temperature to low and cook for 3 to 5 hours.
